voice.text: Armors, helmets, shields and legs. All sizes!

parameter.value: Salutations, |PLAYERNAME|. Welcome to the Ironhouse, {warehouse} of Abran Ironeye.
Thanks for doing business with us, traveller |PLAYERNAME|!
If you'd like to see my offers in armor, ask me for a {trade}.
I work for Abran Ironeye in the armor department.
